critique: The document is an executive order that exempts a government employee from mandatory retirement. This is a fairly mundane action. There is no clear ideological tilt. It does not relate to immigration. It expands executive power slightly by allowing an exception to a rule, but it is a very minor expansion. It does not relate to federalism. It does not relate to national security or civil liberties. It could be argued that it is a minor intervention in the labor market, but it is so minor that it is essentially neutral. It does not relate to social inclusion.
